Based on Cylinder3D, we also achieve the 1st place in the leaderboard of SemanticKITTI Panoptic segmentation. 2020.07: Two papers are accepted by ECCV2020. I am looking for self-motivated Ph.D./MPhil. students, RAs, PostDocs, and Visiting scholars to join my group. Please drop me an email with your CV if you are interested. About Me Yuexin Ma is an Assistant Professor in SIST, ShanghaiTech University. She received the PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong in 2019. Her research interests include computer vision and artificial intelligence. Particularly, her current research focuses on scene understanding, multi-modal learning, autonomous driving, embodied AI, etc. She has published more than 80 papers, including Science Robotics, TPAMI, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, AAAI, IJCAI, IJCV, TOG, Siggraph, etc. As the first author or corresponding author, she has published over 40 papers in top-tier journals and conferences. Research Experience Robotic and Autonomous Driving Lab (RAL) of Baidu 04.2018 - 12.2018 The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill (UNC) 09.2017 - 02.2018 French Institute for Research in Computer Science and Automation (INRIA) 06.2016 - 08.2016 Honors & Awards Outstanding Teaching Award, ShanghaiTech University, 2024 Outstanding Research Award, ShanghaiTech University, 2023 Outstanding Individual of Baidu RAL, 2018 Best Tutor of the University of Hong Kong, 2016 Hong Kong PhD Fellowship Award (HKPFS), 2015 Presidential Scholarship of Shandong University, 2015 Google Merit Scholarship, 2015 CCF (China Computer Federation) Top 100 Outstanding Undergraduates of China, 2013 National Scholarship of China, 2013, 2014
